content.text: I want you to fix how the series table view is. I dont like the way the seasons and episodes are being shown. Also fix summary not showing for each movie and season. Also add functionality to options on top of the screen(Exit,Prerefences etc.) and maybe fix the colors so that they are visually easier to see

I want you to fix how the series table view is. I dont like the way the seasons and episodes are being shown. Also fix summary not showing for each movie and season. Also add functionality to options on top of the screen(Exit,Prerefences etc.) and maybe fix the colors so that they are visually easier to see

autoAppliedRules.name: Repository Information Overview
autoAppliedRules.content:
--

# IMDB Clone Information

## Summary
A JavaFX-based application that simulates an IMDB-like movie and TV series database. The application allows users to browse, search, and rate movies and TV series.

## Structure
- `src/main/java`: Contains all Java source code
- `src/main/resources`: Contains application resources including data files
- `src/test`: Contains test files
- `.mvn`: Maven wrapper files

## Language & Runtime
**Language**: Java
**Version**: Java 21
**Build System**: Maven
**Package Manager**: Maven

## Dependencies
**Main Dependencies**:
- JavaFX (21.0.3): Controls, FXML, Graphics, Media, Web modules
- ControlsFX (11.2.1): Additional JavaFX controls

**Development Dependencies**:
- JUnit Jupiter (5.10.2): Testing framework

## Build & Installation
```bash
mvn clean install
mvn javafx:run
```

## Project Structure
The application follows an MVC-like architecture:

### Model
- `model/Content.java`: Abstract base class for all media content
- `model/Movie.java`: Represents a movie with title, year, genre, etc.
- `model/Series.java`: Represents a TV series with seasons and episodes
- `model/Actor.java`, `model/Director.java`: Represent people involved in productions
- `model/User.java`: Represents application users

### Data Management
- `data/DataManager.java`: Central class for data loading and management
- `data/SearchCriteria.java`: Used for filtering content in searches

### View/Controller
- `gui/MovieManagementGUI.java`: Main JavaFX application UI

### Enums & Exceptions
- `enums/Genre.java`: Enumeration of content genres
- Various exception classes for error handling

## Issues Fixed
1. Fixed parameter mismatch in Content constructor
2. Implemented Movie constructors to match usage in DataManager
3. Fixed DataManager's loadMovies method
4. Implemented searchMovies method that was returning null
5. Fixed getAllMovies and getAllSeries methods
6. Implemented rateMovie functionality
7. Created missing data directory and sample data files
8. Updated module-info.java with required exports
9. Created main application class
10. Fixed pom.xml configuration

content.text: I'll help you fix the series table view, summary display issues, add functionality to the menu options, and improve the visual appearance. Let me first examine the current GUI implementation to understand the structure.
Let me see the rest of the file to understand the series table implementation and menu structure:
Now let me check if there are any FXML files and CSS files to understand the current structure:
Let me check the Series model to understand its structure:
Let me check the Season model:
Let me check the Episode model and Movie model to understand the summary field:
Let me check the Movie model and Content base class to understand the summary field:
Now let me check the Content base class to understand the summary field:
Now let me check the current CSS file to understand the styling:
Now let me check if there's a main.fxml file:
Let me check if there's a main.fxml file or if we need to create one:
Now let me check the series-view.fxml to understand the current series display:

Now I understand the current structure. Based on your requirements, I need to:

1. **Fix the series table view** - Replace the simple TreeView with a proper TableView that shows seasons and episodes better
2. **Fix summary not showing** - Add summary columns to both movies and series tables
3. **Add functionality to menu options** - Implement Exit, Preferences, etc.
4. **Improve colors and visual appearance** - Update CSS for better visibility

Let me start by creating a comprehensive solution. First, let me check if there are any existing controllers:
Now let me check if there's a MainControllerRefactored:

Now I have a good understanding of the current structure. Let me create a comprehensive solution to address all your requirements. I'll start by creating an improved version of the GUI with better series display, summary columns, menu functionality, and improved styling.

Let me first create a new main.fxml file that will be used by the MovieManagementGUI:

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- C:/Users/mas_b/IdeaProjects/imdb_clone/src/main/resources/fxml/main.fxml
+++ C:/Users/mas_b/IdeaProjects/imdb_clone/src/main/resources/fxml/main.fxml
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<?import javafx.geometry.*?>
+<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
+<?import javafx.scene.text.*?>
+
+<BorderPane prefHeight="800.0" prefWidth="1200.0" styleClass="root"
+            xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12"
+            xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1">
+
+    <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
+    <top>
+        <VBox>
+            <MenuBar styleClass="menu-bar">
+                <menus>
+                    <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
+                        <items>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="importDataMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data" onAction="#handleImportData"/>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="exportDataMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data" onAction="#handleExportData"/>
+                            <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="exitMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit" onAction="#handleExit"/>
+                        </items>
+                    </Menu>
+                    <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
+                        <items>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="preferencesMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences" onAction="#handlePreferences"/>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="settingsMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Settings" onAction="#handleSettings"/>
+                        </items>
+                    </Menu>
+                    <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="View">
+                        <items>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="refreshMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Refresh All" onAction="#handleRefreshAll"/>
+                            <CheckMenuItem fx:id="showSummaryMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Show Summary Columns" selected="true" onAction="#handleToggleSummary"/>
+                        </items>
+                    </Menu>
+                    <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Account">
+                        <items>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="loginMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Login" onAction="#handleLogin"/>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="registerMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Register" onAction="#handleRegister"/>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="logoutMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Logout" onAction="#handleLogout" disable="true"/>
+                        </items>
+                    </Menu>
+                    <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
+                        <items>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="aboutMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="About" onAction="#handleAbout"/>
+                            <MenuItem fx:id="helpMenuItem" mnemonicParsing="false" text="User Guide" onAction="#handleHelp"/>
+                        </items>
+                    </Menu>
+                </menus>
+            </MenuBar>
+            
+            <!-- User Status Bar -->
+            <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="user-status-bar">
+                <padding>
+                    <Insets bottom="5.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="5.0"/>
+                </padding>
+                <Label fx:id="userGreeting" styleClass="user-greeting" text="Welcome, Guest"/>
+                <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
+                <Label fx:id="statusLabel" styleClass="status-text" text="Ready"/>
+            </HBox>
+        </VBox>
+    </top>
+
+    <!-- Main Content Area -->
+    <center>
+        <TabPane fx:id="mainTabPane" styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
+            <!-- Tabs will be added programmatically -->
+        </TabPane>
+    </center>
+
+    <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
+    <bottom>
+        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="bottom-status-bar">
+            <padding>
+                <Insets bottom="5.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="5.0"/>
+            </padding>
+            <Label fx:id="itemCountLabel" styleClass="status-text" text=""/>
+            <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
+            <Label fx:id="versionLabel" styleClass="status-text" text="IMDB Clone v1.0"/>
+        </HBox>
+    </bottom>
+    
+</BorderPane>

+/* ===== IMDB Clone - Improved Styles ===== */%0D%0A%0D%0A/* Root styling with modern color scheme */%0D%0A.root %7B%0D%0A    -fx-font-family: %22Segoe UI%22, %22Helvetica Neue%22, Arial, sans-serif;%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #1e1e1e;%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/* ===== MENU BAR STYLING ===== */%0D%0A.menu-bar %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 0 0 1 0;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-bar .menu %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: transparent;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-bar .menu .label %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #cccccc;%0D%0A    -fx-font-size: 13px;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-bar .menu:hover %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-bar .menu:showing %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #007acc;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-bar .menu:showing .label %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/* Context menu styling */%0D%0A.context-menu %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 1;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-item %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: transparent;%0D%0A    -fx-padding: 5 15 5 15;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-item .label %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #cccccc;%0D%0A    -fx-font-size: 12px;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-item:hover %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #007acc;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.menu-item:hover .label %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/* ===== STATUS BARS ===== */%0D%0A.user-status-bar %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #007acc;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #005a9e;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 0 0 1 0;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.user-greeting %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A    -fx-font-weight: bold;%0D%0A    -fx-font-size: 13px;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.bottom-status-bar %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 1 0 0 0;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.status-text %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #cccccc;%0D%0A    -fx-font-size: 11px;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/* ===== TAB PANE STYLING ===== */%0D%0A.main-tab-pane %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #1e1e1e;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.main-tab-pane .tab-header-area %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 0 0 1 .tab:selected .tab-label %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A    -fx-font-weight: bold;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.main-tab-pane .tab:hover %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: -fx-background-color: #252526;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 1;%0D%0A    -fx-table-cell-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-view .column-header-background %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 0 0 2 0;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-view .column-header %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 0 1 0 0;%0D%0A    -fx-padding: 8 12 8 12;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-view .column-header .label %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A    -fx-font-weight: bold;%0D%0A    -fx-font-size: 12px;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-view .column-header:hover %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #252526;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A    -fx-border-width: 0 0 1 0;%0D%0A    -fx-padding: 4 0 4 0;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell:odd %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #2d2d30;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell:selected %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #007acc;%0D%0A    -fx-border-color: #005a9e;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell:hover %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #3e3e42;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell:selected:hover %7B%0D%0A    -fx-background-color: #005a9e;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-cell %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #cccccc;%0D%0A    -fx-padding: 6 12 6 12;%0D%0A    -fx-font-size: 12px;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell:selected .table-cell %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #ffffff;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/* Special styling for summary columns */%0D%0A.summary-cell %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #b4b4b4;%0D%0A    -fx-font-style: italic;%0D%0A    -fx-wrap-text: true;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A.table-row-cell:selected .summary-cell %7B%0D%0A    -fx-text-fill: #e6e6e6;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/* ===== TREE VIEW STYLING ===== */%0D%0A.tree-view %7B%0D%0A Also add functionality to options on top of the screen(Exit,Prerefences etc.) and maybe fix the colors so that they are visually easier to see
Avoid repeating steps you've already taken.

autoAppliedRules.name: Repository Information Overview
autoAppliedRules.content:
--

# IMDB Clone Information

## Summary
A JavaFX-based application that simulates an IMDB-like movie and TV series database. The application allows users to browse, search, and rate movies and TV series.

## Structure
- `src/main/java`: Contains all Java source code
- `src/main/resources`: Contains application resources including data files
- `src/test`: Contains test files
- `.mvn`: Maven wrapper files

## Language & Runtime
**Language**: Java
**Version**: Java 21
**Build System**: Maven
**Package Manager**: Maven

## Dependencies
**Main Dependencies**:
- JavaFX (21.0.3): Controls, FXML, Graphics, Media, Web modules
- ControlsFX (11.2.1): Additional JavaFX controls

**Development Dependencies**:
- JUnit Jupiter (5.10.2): Testing framework

## Build & Installation
```bash
mvn clean install
mvn javafx:run
```

## Project Structure
The application follows an MVC-like architecture:

### Model
- `model/Content.java`: Abstract base class for all media content
- `model/Movie.java`: Represents a movie with title, year, genre, etc.
- `model/Series.java`: Represents a TV series with seasons and episodes
- `model/Actor.java`, `model/Director.java`: Represent people involved in productions
- `model/User.java`: Represents application users

### Data Management
- `data/DataManager.java`: Central class for data loading and management
- `data/SearchCriteria.java`: Used for filtering content in searches

### View/Controller
- `gui/MovieManagementGUI.java`: Main JavaFX application UI

### Enums & Exceptions
- `enums/Genre.java`: Enumeration of content genres
- Various exception classes for error handling

## Issues Fixed
1. Fixed parameter mismatch in Content constructor
2. Implemented Movie constructors to match usage in DataManager
3. Fixed DataManager's loadMovies method
4. Implemented searchMovies method that was returning null
5. Fixed getAllMovies and getAllSeries methods
6. Implemented rateMovie functionality
7. Created missing data directory and sample data files
8. Updated module-info.java with required exports
9. Created main application class
10. Fixed pom.xml configuration
